title: 1.11.2指令
author: 幻狱

replies.author: pineapple_
replies.txt_content: summon falling_block ~ ~1 ~ {Block:"command_block",Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~ ~ wall_sign 5 replace {Text1:"{\\"text\\":\\"Click\\",\\"clickEvent\\":{\\"action\\":\\"run_command\\",\\"value\\":\\"blockdata ~-1 ~ ~ {Command:\\\\\\"/give @p minecraft:diamond_sword 1 0 {AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:90.0,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Health,Slot:mainhand}],ench:[{id:16,lvl:5},{id:20,lvl:2}],Unbreakable:1b,display:{Name:\\\\u00a76曙光之剑,Lore:[\\\\u00a7e传说中的神剑,\\\\u00a7f据说拥有者可以获得金刚不坏之躯,\\\\u00a7l\\\\u00a74给人们带来希望,\\\\u00a76曙光之剑,\\\\u00a76曙光之剑,\\\\u00a76曙光之剑]}}\\\\\\"}\\"}}"}"}}复制代码

replies.author: 幻狱
replies.txt_content:
pineapple_ 发表于 2018-2-3 23:02
命令牌子??????
就是彩色告示牌

replies.author: pineapple_
replies.txt_content:
幻狱 发表于 2018-2-4 08:22
就是彩色告示牌
刚刚那个命令执行后，会在上面放一个命令方块
那个命令方块就是彩色牌子命令

replies.author: 幻狱
replies.txt_content:
pineapple_ 发表于 2018-2-4 12:53
刚刚那个命令执行后，会在上面放一个命令方块
那个命令方块就是彩色牌子命令 ...
/give @p sign 1 0 {    BlockEntityTag: {        Text1: "{\"text\":\"0.0\",\"color\":\"dark_red\"}",        Text2: "{\"text\":\" \"}",        Text3: "{\"text\":\" \"}",        Text4: "{\"text\":\" \",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/tellraw @p {text:\\\"MC\\\",color:blue,underlined:true,clickEvent:{action:open_url,value:\\\"mc\\\"}}\"}}"    },    display: {        Name: "Custom Sign"    }}


就是这个指令做出来的告示牌帮忙改成1.11.2可以用的

replies.author: pineapple_
replies.txt_content:
幻狱 发表于 2018-2-4 16:01
/give @p sign 1 0 {    BlockEntityTag: {        Text1: "{\"text\":\"0.0\",\"color\":\"dark_red\"}" .../give @p sign 1 0 {BlockEntityTag:{Text1:"{"text":"0.0","color":"dark_red"}",Text2: "{"text":" "}",Text3: "{"text":" "}",Text4: "{"text":" ","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/tellraw @p {\\"text\\":\\"MC\\",\\"color\\":\\"blue\\",\\"underlined\\":\\"true\\",\\"clickEvent\\":{\\"action\\":\\"open_url\\",\\"value\\":\\"mc\\"}}"}}"},display:{Name:"Custom Sign"}}复制代码

顺便说一句url需要是一个有效网址才能点开，为了防止你点不动然后怪我改错了，我帮你写了个有效网址

/give @p sign 1 0 {BlockEntityTag:{Text1:"{"text":"0.0","color":"dark_red"}",Text2: "{"text":" "}",Text3: "{"text":" "}",Text4: "{"text":" ","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/tellraw @p {\\"text\\":\\"MC\\",\\"color\\":\\"blue\\",\\"underlined\\":\\"true\\",\\"clickEvent\\":{\\"action\\":\\"open_url\\",\\"value\\":\\"http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-778955-1-1.html\\"}}"}}"},display:{Name:"Custom Sign"}}复制代码
